messages.messageBody:
I have a dear friend that emailed me saying "she had started a group for
Baha'i Unschoolers. She is the only member. She posts to the list every
day. She doesn't talk much about Baha'i things, more often about
unschooling things. She wonders if anyone will join that group. There are
a few supposed unschoolers on the Baha'i Homeschooling list, but they're not
as committed to UNschooling as to HOMEschooling. "


The group is specifically called bahaiunschoolers@yahoogroups.com

I told her I'd sent this information to the lists I'm on, so here it is.
Please forward this to anyone who might be interested.

Thanks,

Peace and Love from a Spiritual Unschooler...
Barda Allen
315 State Street
Helena, MT 59601
406-449-7513
HeavensOnEarth@...
